short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send previews for all emails in your journey. Say goodbye to select each email individually in Journey Builder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With a single click, you can send all emails previews within your journey, saving you valuable time and effort. Say goodbye to the tedious task of sending email previews one by one in Journey Builder.  Enhance your Salesforce Marketing Cloud (SFMC) experience with our free Chrome extension, "SFMC Journey Email Previews Sender"

## Key Highlights:
- Effortless Email Sending: send ALLL emails in your journey at once.
- Security First: We prioritize your data security. Only you can access your data, ensuring your data remains private and confidential.
- Active Development: We are actively implementing improvements. Report any issues or suggest new features on the extension page.

## How to Use:
1. Navigate to your Salesforce Marketing Cloud Journey Builder page.
2. Ensure you have an entry data extension created with at least one row for preview purposes.
3. Click the extension icon (a red airplane) to open the sidebar.
4. Fill in the recipients and prefix, then click "SEND EMAILS."
5. The extension grabs all email activities and sends you the rendered email previews using native SFMC features.
6. Check send histories and logs in the log panel for insights.

## Common Questions

Q: What if sending fails sometimes?
A: Due to internet and SFMC response speed, occasional failures may occur. Simply try again. If issues persist, please report them to us.

Q: Is this plugin safe?
A: Rest assured, our plugin neither collects nor stores any data from your SFMC account, not even login cookies, data extensions, or journey names. The only data stored is the recipient and email prefix you provide for sending previews. Your data security is our priority.
